author: Staff Reporter
text:
S. Sudalaimuthupandi (39), a police constable in Kovilpatti west station, allegedly committed suicide by hanging in his house in the police quarters on Wednesday.

Sources said he was a addicted to liquor and a domestic dispute in his family was suspected to be the cause. He was married for eight years but the couple had no child, the sources added. Kovilpatti east police have filed a case based on a complaint lodged by T. Sankarapandi (64), father of deceased. The body was taken to Kovilpatti Government Headquarters Hospital for post-mortem.
title: Constable commits suicide
